item.description:
Let's meet at a new place ... J.A. Stats Restaurant & Bar. They just opened about a month ago. I went there last night with friends and we liked it.

I plan to be there from 5:30pm to 7:30pm, but feel free to come and go as you please.

Everyone will maintain their own tab or pay as you go. There will be no group tab because people will be arriving and leaving at different times.

I'll try to get the tables at the back of the restaurant, so look for me there.

Looking forward to seeing friends and meeting new people!

Check out J.A. Stats' website for more info:

http://www.jastats.co...

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: Call me at 617-999-9094 to find me, if you don't recognize me from my picture.
item.why: To socialize with other people and to wish me a happy birthday!
item.name: TGIF
